hero.title: About Glodinas Finance B.V.
hero.subtitle: Your trusted partner for professional bookkeeping and financial services in the Netherlands.

company.title: Our Company
company.paragraph1: Glodinas Finance B.V. is a professional bookkeeping firm based in the Netherlands, dedicated to providing high-quality financial services to entrepreneurs and businesses.
company.paragraph2: We specialize in comprehensive bookkeeping solutions for ZZP'ers (self-employed professionals) and BVs (private limited companies), offering competitive rates starting at €130 per month (excluding VAT) for ZZP'ers and €250 per month (excluding VAT) for BVs, including DGA payroll administration.
company.paragraph3: Our mission is to help businesses maintain accurate financial records, comply with Dutch tax regulations, and make informed financial decisions to support their growth and success.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our services

questions.question: How quickly can you set up my bookkeeping?
questions.answer: We can typically set up your bookkeeping within 1-2 business days after receiving all necessary information and documentation.

questions.question: Do you offer services in English?
questions.answer: Yes, we provide all our services in both Dutch and English to accommodate international clients.

questions.question: How often will I receive financial reports?
questions.answer: We provide monthly financial reports as standard, but can adjust the frequency based on your specific needs.

questions.question: Can you help with tax planning?
questions.answer: Absolutely! Tax planning is an integral part of our services. We help you optimize your tax position while ensuring full compliance with Dutch tax regulations.

process.title: Our Onboarding Process
process.subtitle: We've designed a streamlined process to get you up and running quickly

step1.title: Sign Up for Moneybird
step1.description: Start by signing up for Moneybird using our referral link. This cloud-based accounting software will form the foundation of your financial administration.
items: Add Glodinas Finance as your accountant

step2.title: Schedule Setup Meeting
step2.description: Schedule a setup meeting with our team to configure your administration. We offer both in-person and remote TeamViewer sessions for your convenience.

We'll set up bank connections, client database, and invoice structure

step3.title: Choose Your Subscription
step3.description: Select the subscription plan that fits your business needs. We offer tailored packages for both ZZP'ers and BVs.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Common questions about our onboarding process

questions.question: How long does the setup process take?
questions.answer: The entire onboarding process typically takes 2-3 business days from initial sign-up to full setup. The setup meeting itself usually takes about 1-2 hours.

questions.question: Do I need to prepare anything for the setup meeting?
questions.answer: Yes, please have your bank account login details, business registration information, and any existing client/invoice data ready for the setup meeting. This will help us efficiently configure your system.

questions.question: Can I switch from another bookkeeping service?
questions.answer: Absolutely! We can help you transition from your current bookkeeping service to our system. We'll guide you through the process of transferring your financial data and ensure a smooth transition.

questions.question: What if I need help after the initial setup?
questions.answer: Our support doesn't end after setup. You'll have ongoing access to our team for any questions or assistance you might need. We're just a phone call or email away.

questions.question: Is there a minimum contract period?
questions.answer: Our standard subscription is month-to-month, with no long-term commitment required. You can cancel anytime with 30 days' notice.
